answers.a: Outside of the unit circle in the z-plane

questions.question: Q3. What is the behavior of pole, if the natural frequency increased from 0 value with constant damping ratio?

answers.a: Moving away from the imaginary axis in left half of the s-plane
answers.b: Moving away from the imaginary axis in right half of the s-plane
answers.c: Moving towards the imaginary axis in the s-plane
answers.d: Moving towards the real axis in the s-plane

questions.question: Q4. What is the behavior of pole, if the damping ratio changes from 0 value with constant natural frequency?

answers.a: Moving away from the imaginary axis in the z-plane
answers.b: Moving towards the real axis in the z-plane
answers.c: Moving towards the circumference of the unit circle from inside in the z-plane
answers.d: Moving towards the circumference of the unit circle from outside in the z-plane

questions.question: Q5. If the damping ratio value is zero with change in natural frequency, then the poles location:

answers.a: Always on the unit cirle in the z-plane
answers.b: Always on the real axis in the z-plane
answers.c: Always on the imaginary axis in the z-plane
answers.d: Moving towards the circumference of the unit circle from outside in the z-plane
